title: League Screen Saver LOVE IT!!
body: I love this new screen saver from Riot how you can change it to your preference but i wanna know why isn't it an application you can open you need to go through files, back ground, screen savers to actually get to it on mac that is and it kinda annoys me that i have to do that but other than that i freaken love it to death!!

replies.body:
I almost forgot there's a function call screen saver lol
Haven't used it since win98 I think

Yeah, I had to go to the support page for Mac to see how to actually access it.

Kinda easy after that tbh
